title: Trim, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: fancy compound satin
description: Dark red-orange ground with a design formed by primary dark blue weft and secondary wefts of light and dark blue, green, pink, tan and yellow. Geometric design with minute lozenges and swastikas grouped into squares with rosettes in some areas of the design. Lotus medallions at intersections. With insects or butterflies. Right selvage present.

tombstone.epitaph:
Trim, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: silk
Technique: fancy compound satin. Gift of Miss Beatrice Kates. 1940-4-2.
